use.flag: Adds access to services related to object, block, and file storage.
Adds access to Compute and Auto Scaling related services.
Adds access to network and CDN related services.
Adds access functionality to RDB, NoSQL, TimeStream, and Ledger related services.
Adds access to big data and analysis related services.
Adds access to messaging and notification services.
Adds access to monitoring and operation related services.
Adds access to services related to ID management and security auditing.
Adds access to machine learning and AI related services.
Adds access to IoT and edge services.
Adds access to media processing related services.
Adds access to CI/CD and developer related services.
Adds access to operational management related services.
Add access to services that do not easily fit into existing groups.
